name: Tinyville Confidential
description:
How to play
  • Move houses by dragging them to a new position
  • Keeping residents happy by moving their houses next to friends and away from enemies
  • You get a new resident when the happiness meter fills up
Game features
  • Unique house-rearranging puzzling mechanic
  • Constantly changing puzzles based on residents' random interactions
  • Cute pixel art style
  • Humorous updates about resident's relationships via the Tinyville Confidential newspaper
  • Originally created in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 23 with the theme "tiny world"
Credits
  • Design, code, art by Rose Abernathy
  • Made with FlashPunk
  • Music: "Mini Lead Melody" by Enrique Plazaola
